CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cards(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, description TEXT);
ALTER TABLE cards ADD COLUMN card_image TEXT;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS paths(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, card_id INTEGER, path TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tasks(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, path_id INTEGER, year INTEGER, month INTEGER, day INTEGER);
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'IMPORTANT TO ME\', \'\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'VERY IMPORTANT TO ME\', \'\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'NOT IMPORTANT TO ME\', \'\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ACCEPTANCE\', \'to be accepted as I am\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ACCURACY\', \'to be accurate in my opinions and beliefs\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ACHIEVEMENT\', \'to have important accomplishments\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ADVENTURE\', \'to have new and exciting experiences\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ATTRACTIVENESS\', \'to be physically attractive\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'AUTHORITY\', \'to be in charge of and responsible for others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'AUTONOMY\', \'to be self-determined and independent\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'BEAUTY\', \'to appreciate beauty around me\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'CARING\', \'to take care of others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'CHALLENGE\', \'to take on difficult tasks and problems\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'CHANGE\', \'to have a life full of change and variety\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'COMFORT\', \'to have a pleasant and comfortable life\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'COMMITMENT\', \'to make enduring, meaningful commitments\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'COMPASSION\', \'to feel and act on concern for others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'CONTRIBUTION\', \'to make a lasting contribution in the world\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'COOPERATION\', \'to work collaboratively with others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'COURTESY\', \'to be considerate and polite toward others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'CREATIVITY\', \'to have new and original ideas\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'DEPENDABILITY\', \'to be reliable and trustworthy\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'DUTY\', \'to carry out my duties and obligations\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ECOLOGY\', \'to live in harmony with the environment\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'EXCITEMENT\', \'to have a life full of thrills and stimulation\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FAITHFULNESS\', \'to be loyal and true in relationships\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FAME\', \'to be known and recognized\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FAMILY\', \'to have a happy, loving family\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FITNESS\', \'to be physically fit and strong\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FLEXIBILITY\', \'to adjust to new circumstances easily\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FORGIVENESS\', \'to be forgiving of others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FRIENDSHIP\', \'to have close, supportive friends\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'FUN\', \'to play and have fun\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'GENEROSITY\', \'to give what I have to others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'GENUINENESS\', \'to act in a manner that is true to who I am\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'GOD\'\'S WILL\', \'to seek and obey the will of God\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'GROWTH\', \'to keep changing and growing\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'HEALTH\', \'to be physically well and healthy\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'HELPFULNESS\', \'to be helpful to others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'HONESTY\', \'to be honest and truthful\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'HOPE\', \'to maintain a positive and optimistic outlook\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'HUMILITY\', \'to be modest and unassuming\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'HUMOR\', \'to see the humorous side of myself and the world\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'INDEPENDENCE\', \'to be free from dependence on others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'INDUSTRY\', \'to work hard and well at my life tasks\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'INNER PEACE\', \'to experience personal peace\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'INTIMACY\', \'to share my innermost experiences with others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'JUSTICE\', \'to promote fair and equal treatment for all\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'KNOWLEDGE\', \'to learn and contribute valuable knowledge\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'LEISURE\', \'to take time to relax and enjoy\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'LOVED\', \'to be loved by those close to me\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'LOVING\', \'to give love to others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'MASTERY\', \'to be competent in my everyday activities\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'MINDFULNESS\', \'to live conscious and mindful of the present moment\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'MODERATION\', \'to avoid excesses and find a middle ground\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'MONOGAMY\', \'to have one close, loving relationship\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'NON-CONFORMITY\', \'to question and challenge authority and norms\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'NURTURANCE\', \'to take care of and nurture others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'OPENNESS\', \'to be open to new experiences, ideas, and options\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ORDER\', \'to have a life that is well-ordered and organized\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'PASSION\', \'to have deep feelings about ideas, activities, or people\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'PLEASURE\', \'to feel good\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'POPULARITY\', \'to be well-liked by many people\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'POWER\', \'to have control over others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'PURPOSE\', \'to have meaning and direction in my life\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'RATIONALITY\', \'to be guided by reason and logic\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'REALISM\', \'to see and act realistically and practically\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'RESPONSIBILITY\', \'to make and carry out responsible decisions\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'RISK\', \'to take risks and chances\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'ROMANCE\', \'to have intense, exciting love in my life\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SAFETY\', \'to be safe and secure\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SELF-ACCEPTANCE\', \'to accept myself as I am\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SELF-CONTROL\', \'to be disciplined in my own actions\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SELF-ESTEEM\', \'to feel good about myself\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SELF-KNOWLEDGE\', \'to have a deep and honest understanding of myself\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SERVICE\', \'to be of service to others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SEXUALITY\', \'to have an active and satisfying sex life\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SIMPLICITY\', \'to live life simply, with minimal needs\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SOLITUDE\', \'to have time and space where I can be apart from others\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'SPIRITUALITY\', \'to grow and mature spiritually\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'STABILITY\', \'to have a life that stays fairly consistent\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'TOLERANCE\', \'to accept and respect those who differ from me\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'TRADITION\', \'to follow respected patterns of the past\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'VIRTUE\', \'to live a morally pure and excellent life\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'WEALTH\', \'to have plenty of money\');
INSERT INTO cards (name, description) VALUES(\'WORLD PEACE\', \'to work to promote peace in the world\');
